tool.name: rnmr1d-stacked-plot
tool.description: Draw stacked plot of NMR FID.
tool.command: mkdir -p /data; stacked-plot.r data_matrix_file=$infile pdf_output=$outfile stack_height=$stack_height max_ppm_shift=$max_ppm_shift plot_type=$plot_type;
tool.help:
Create a plot of an aligned NMR data matrix

----------------- Workflow position -----------------
Right after the nmrMLConv in a workflow or Galaxy nmrML/Vedor RAW NMR data
----------- Input files -----------
Aligned NMR data matrix (CSV format)
---------- Parameters ---------- | Graphical height of stack [0..1; default: 0.67]: Height of the peaks for the spectra in the plot | Maximum ppm shift [0..1; default: 1]: The ppm shift | Plot type options [perspective, simple]: | Perspective: 3D view | Simple: improved 2D view

Plot (PDF format)
